_header: Blessed be thou Baptist born and forth brought
_description: In honour of St John Baptist — ten 14-line stanzas

BLAdd39574.First Lines:
Blissed be thow Baptist borne & forth broghtOf a byrde baran
                    bales to bete…
BLAdd39574.Last Lines: …Prey for vs to cristþat heuen be oure mede

Day,  Mabel,
                        ed.
